cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your Stitch characters.)
ADORING FANS Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert it to draw a card.

The best part about a beachside concert is that there's always room for one more.

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText:
FREEZE {E} – Exert chosen opposing character.

Recreated by magical ink, Elsa found herself in an unfamiliar new world. Fortunately, ice works the same way everywhere.

cards.name: Cruella De Vil
cards.cardText:
YOU'LL BE SORRY! When this character is challenged and banished, you may return chosen character to their player’s hand.

When she stops by, misery is company.

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText:
DRAGON FIRE When you play this character, you may banish chosen opposing character.

The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.

cards.name: Robin Hood
cards.cardText:
FEED THE POOR When you play this character, if an opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw a card.
GOOD SHOT During your turn, this character has Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

"We never rob. We just sort of borrow a bit from those who can afford it."

cards.name: Captain Hook
cards.cardText:
Challenger +2 (When challenging, this character gets +2 {S}.)

He loves to make light of a foe's predicament.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
GET A CLUE When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.

cards.name: HeiHei
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to chosen character's {S} this turn.)

"Sometimes, our strengths lie beneath the surface. Far beneath, in some cases...."
-Moana

cards.name: Yzma
cards.cardText:
YOU'RE EXCUSED Whenever this character quests, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

"When I want your opinion, I will give it to you!"

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
ALL FOR ONE Your other Musketeer characters get +1 {S}.

cards.name: Goofy
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
AND TWO FOR TEA! When you play this character, you may remove up to 2 damage from each of your Musketeer characters.

"En gawrsh!"

cards.name: Donald Duck
cards.cardText:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)
STAY ALERT! During your turn, your Musketeer characters gain Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Cinderella
cards.cardText:
HAVE COURAGE When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

She's always had the heart of a champion—now she'll have the skills, too.

cards.name: Bucky
cards.cardText:
SQUEAK Whenever you play a Floodborn character, if you used Shift to play them, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

"There's a lot of nuance to squirrel."
–Kronk

cards.name: Minnie Mouse
cards.cardText:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
UNDERSEA ADVENTURE Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 {L} this turn.

cards.name: Robin Hood
cards.cardText:
SKIRMISH {E} - Deal 1 damage to chosen character.

"Capable? You don't know the half of it."
–Little John

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
GLAD YOU'RE HERE! Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 {I} less for the next character you play this turn.

"Come on in—there's lots to explore."

cards.name: Elsa
cards.cardText:
Challenger +3 (While challenging, this character gets +3 {S}.)

The power of ice may not stop the flood, but it will
help protect Lorcana.

cards.name: Genie
cards.cardText:
Shift 6 (You may pay 6 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Genie.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
PHENOMENAL COSMIC POWER! Whenever this character quests, you may play an action with cost 5 or less for free.

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
"His destructive programming is taking effect. He will
be irresistibly drawn to large cities, where he will back
up sewers, reverse street signs, and steal everyone's
left shoe."
—Jumba Jookiba

cards.name: Maleficent
cards.cardText:
She had no invitation—and needed no
introduction.

cards.name: Maui
cards.cardText:
When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's
owner is optional.

cards.name: Gaston
cards.cardText:
Reckless (This character can’t quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

It's not arrogance when you really are the best.

cards.name: Kit Cloudkicker
cards.cardText:
SKYSURFING When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2 {S} or less to their player’s hand.

"It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going. Yahoooo!"

cards.name: Jolly Roger
cards.cardText:
LOOK ALIVE, YOU SWABS! Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)
ALL HANDS ON DECK! Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

cards.name: How Far I'll Go
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the other into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: John Silver
cards.cardText:
CHART YOUR OWN COURSE For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1 {L}. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

"I was never much good at games. Always hated to lose."

cards.name: Stitch
cards.cardText:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Stitch.)
ADORING FANS Whenever you play a character with cost 2 or less, you may exert them to draw a card.

cards.name: Rapunzel
cards.cardText:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Rapunzel.)
LET YOUR POWER SHINE Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Pinocchio
cards.cardText:
TELLING LIES When you play this character, you may exert chosen opposing character.

"A lie keeps growing and growing until it's as plain as the nose on your face."
-Blue Fairy

cards.name: Four Dozen Eggs
cards.cardText:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {E} to sing this song for free.)
Your characters gain Resist +2 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.name: Mickey Mouse
cards.cardText:
Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {S} to another chosen character's {S} this turn.)
STRIKE UP THE MUSIC When you play this character, chosen character gains Support this turn.

cards.name: Ursula's Lair
cards.cardText:
SLIPPERY HALLS Whenever a character is banished in a challenge while here, you may return them to your hand.
SEAT OF POWER Characters named Ursula get +1 {L} while here.

cards.name: Hidden Inkcaster
cards.cardText:
FRESH INK When you play this item, draw a card.
UNEXPECTED TREASURE All cards in your hand count as having {IW}.

"It looks like it's been here forever."
-Flounder

cards.name: Mulan
cards.cardText:
TIME TO SHINE Whenever you play an action, this character gets +2 {S} this turn.

Ursula's messengers fled, leaving behind tendrils of dark ink.

cards.name: Ursula
cards.cardText:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {I} to play this on top of one of your characters named Ursula.)
NOW I AM THE RULER! Whenever this character quests, exert chosen character.
YOU'LL LISTEN TO ME! Other characters can't exert to sing songs.

cards.name: Scrooge Mcduck
cards.cardText:
TREASURE FINDER Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {I} less for the next item you play this turn.

A strange new world is the perfect place to make a strange new fortune!

cards.name: Flotsam & Jetsam
cards.cardText:
Shift: Discard 2 cards (You may discard 2 cards to play this on top of one of your characters named Flotsam or Jetsam.)
(This character counts as being named both Flotsam and Jetsam.)
